name: Magical Flute
description:
Submission for GDKO 2023 Round 2

Controls:

Use either Mouse/Keyboard or a Controller

  • Move with WASD or the left stick
  • Look around with the mouse or right stick
  • Interact with Space or right facebutton (B on an xBox Controller)
  • Equip/Unquip your flute with left shift or the bottom facebutton (A on an xBox Controller)
  • Charge your attack by holding down the left mouse button or the right trigger
  • Keep the notes inside with the mouse or the right stick

I made all code, sounds, music and art assets during the jam. I would like to have expanded the story more, but I overscopted the project a bit and had trouble getting the flute fighting mechanic to feel decent.
